actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain areas located in the Francis Marion National Forest, South Carolina, as wilderness areas.

summary.text: Designates specified areas located in the Francis Marion National Forest in South Carolina as wilderness areas and as components of the National Wilderness Preservation System.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain areas located in the Francis Marion National Forest, South Carolina, as wilderness areas.
